GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v4.14.289
GSD.description:
sfc: fix kernel panic when creating VF

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.289 by commit b9072305270579a9d6afc9b926166231e5b1a7c8, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit d778819609a27efd5358da8151a0ad3507243e19. For more details please see the references link.
